attributes.title: Creativity Is Ability To Keep Inner Space's Inspiration Through Continuity Till It Becomes Reality
attributes.description:
24 AUGUST 2020

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN TIME AND SPACE EXTERNALLY IS BASED ON CONTINUITY, INTERNALLY BASED ON INTENSITY.

*ANYTHING PLANTED CONSCIOUSLY IN SPACE BECOMES REALITY IN TIME. ANYTHING CONTINUOUSLY PLANTED IN TIME GETS INTO SPACE.

*BE FULLY AWAKE. THIS IS GOING TO BE ONE OF THE SUPERCONSCIOUS BREAKTHROUGH SATSANGS.

*UNDERSTAND ‘INFINITE POSSIBILITY MULTIPLICATION’. IF YOU WORK ONLY IN ONE LINE, YOU EXPAND. IF YOU DECIDE: ‘NO BOUNDARY FOR ME’, IF YOU DECIDE, ‘I WILL EXPAND ON ALL INFINITE DIRECTIONS’, IT BECOMES ‘INFINITE POSSIBILITY MULTIPLICATION’.

*IF YOU SAY, ‘I AM BUSY BECOMING ENTREPRENEUR, I WON'T CARE ABOUT MY HEALTH, I WILL HAVE A BIG POT BELLY,’ AND DUMP ALL JUNK FOOD, AND SAY, ‘NO TIME FOR YOGA, I AM A GREAT ENTREPRENEUR,’ THEN AT THE AGE OF 40, MONDAY MORNING...IT WILL BE OVER.

*ESPECIALLY NRI’S, TAKE CARE OF YOUR FOOD. YOU ARE EATING SHIT AND JUNK FOR WHICH YOUR WHOLE GENETICAL SYSTEM OR DIGESTIVE SYSTEM IS NOT PREPARED.

*NRI’S: LESS YOU EAT, MORE YOU WILL LIVE LONG. INDIANS NOT LIVING IN INDIA, ESPECIALLY THE ONES LIVING IN USA, EUROPE, DUBAI, CANADA, LISTEN: YOU HAVE TOO MUCH JUNK IN YOUR LIFE. STOP EATING.

*AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE, REDUCE EATING. FIND SOME REASON TO STOP EATING. CALL IT PRADOSHA VRATAM OR EKADASHI VRATAM OR NIRAHARA SAMYAMA, BUT STOP EATING. THEN YOU WILL LIVE LONG AND HEALTHY.

*IF YOU WORK ONLY IN ONE LINE, YOU ARE EXPANDING ONLY ON THAT ONE POSSIBILITY. IF YOU DECIDE, ‘I WILL EXPAND IN ALL MY POSSIBILITIES,’ THE MULTIPLICATION IN ALL YOUR POSSIBILITIES IS POSSIBLE.

*YOU CAN HAVE A HEALTHY 6-PACK BODY, A BILLION DOLLAR BUSINESS, AN ABSOLUTELY UNCLUTCHED ENLIGHTENED STATE, EVERYTHING HAPPENING STRESS-FREE, SPONTANEOUSLY, SIMULTANEOUSLY.

*I AM NOT IGNITING YOUR GREED THROUGH THESE WORDS, I AM JUST IGNITING YOUR SPEED THROUGH THESE WORDS. I DON'T MAKE YOU GREEDY, I MAKE YOU RESPONSIBLE.

*I WILL GIVE YOU SOME TIPS FOR INFINITE POSSIBILITY EXPANSION: ALL THE TIME BE LIKE A CHILD, HOW IT TRIES TO BE INVOLVED AND ACTIVE IN EVERYTHING... MORNING, JUMP AND MAKE YOUR OWN COFFEE, MAKE YOUR OWN TOOTH POWDER! GET THE NEEM STICK AND HARITAKI, CHARCOAL POWDER, SALT, MIX AND BRUSH!

*LEARN TO PLUCK YOUR OWN FLOWERS AND DO PUJA. MORE AND MORE LET THINGS BECOME ALIVE, BUBBLY…!

*MAKE GARLANDS. DON'T TELL, ‘I HAVE A BILLION DOLLAR BUSINESS, NO TIME TO MAKE GARLANDS. I WILL MAKE ENOUGH MONEY AND MAKE GOLD GARLAND FOR YOU SWAMIJI. LET ME BE INTELLIGENT AND SMART. I WILL MAKE A GOLDEN MALA. THAT IS MORE PRODUCTIVE FOR YOU AND KAILASA AND THE WORLD. INSTEAD OF MAKING A GARLAND SPENDING HALF AN HOUR, IN THAT SAME HALF AN HOUR, I WILL MAKE MILLION DOLLARS AND MAKE 100 KG GOLD AND MAKE A MALA FOR YOU.’ NO! I AM SAYING A CLEAR NO!

*IF YOU SPEND HALF HOUR AND MAKE A GARLAND AND OFFER, THE KIND OF SPACE YOU WILL CARRY, YOU WILL MAKE BILLION DOLLAR DEAL INSTEAD OF MILLION DOLLAR DEAL! FIRST THINGS FIRST.

*YOU MAY BE CAPABLE OF BILLION BUT YOU ARE MAKING MILLION BECAUSE YOU ARE NOT MAKING GARLAND WITH YOUR OWN HANDS. ONLY FIRST ONE MONTH IT WILL FEEL DIFFICULT. FIRST ONE MONTH CAN BE TRIAL AND ERROR. ANYWAY TILL DECEMBER NOTHING MUCH CAN BE DONE. YOU WILL BE SURPRISED THAT WHETHER IT IS WORLD HEALTH ORGANISATION OR UNITED NATIONS OR WHATEVER, THEY ARE CONFIRMING WHATEVER I UTTERED ABOUT THIS PRALAYA. SO TILL DECEMBER YOU HAVE TIME.

*LEARN THIS LIFESTYLE OF BUBBLY, BUBBLY, BUBBLY…!

*INTENSITY IS EXCITEMENT IN YOUR INNER SPACE. CONTINUITY IS ABILITY TO KEEP THE VISUALISATION TILL IT BECOMES REALITY IN THE PHYSICAL MANIFESTATION. THESE ARE SOME OF THE ULTIMATE COSMIC PRINCIPLES I AM SHARING FROM ALL THE HINDU TATTVA DARSHANAS.

*DOING PUJA, MAKING GARLAND FOR DEITY, DOING DECORATION, ALL THIS CREATES AN AMAZING FERTILE GROUND IN YOUR INNER SPACE. LIFE IS NOT BETWEEN ONE BIRTH AND ONE DEATH. IT IS MULTI BIRTHS AND DEATHS. I HAVE DONE IT IN MY LIFE, MULTIPLE BIRTHS. THAT IS WHY I AM TELLING YOU THIS.

*INTENSE EXCITEMENT WHEN IT IS ADDED WITH CREATIVITY, ESPECIALLY THE MOST SUPERIOR CREATIVITY, IS HINDU KRIYAS.

*SEE MY GURUKUL KIDS. JUST BY DECORATING DEITIES, THEY MANIFEST POWERS, BECAUSE INTENSITY OF THE INNER WORLD STARTS MANIFESTING AS CONTINUITY OF THE OUTER WORLD.

READ MORE AT: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4266612910093193
